data.author: HypCo

changelog.release_notes:
Date: mm/dd

Days of the week:
Mon = 1
Tue = 2
Wed = 3
Thur = 4
Fri = 5
Sat = 6
Sun = 7

Bluetooth notice: Two quick vibrates and a 'danger' shadow mark appears in the bottom left corner until you reconnect.

Battery Bar: Across the bottom of your screen to let you know how much you have left.

Charging notice: A 'cache' shadow mark appears in the top left corner to show that you are charging.

data.description:
An innocent watch face until you give it a shake to unveil your sneaky lifestyle.

Credits:
This watch face uses the idea from "Hail Hydra" made by Jesse Millar.

Bethesda for making Skyrim.
